options.optionText: Nice view. Is that the vault's new uniform standard?
options.responseText: Oh, sweetie, if this was the new standard, we'd all be in deep trouble—or having a lot more fun. Too bad you're just window shopping.

followUpOptions.optionText: Shopping, huh? What’s the price tag?
followUpOptions.responseText: A bit more than you can afford. But hey, keep dreaming.

followUpOptions.optionText: You sure you’re not just flaunting it on purpose?
followUpOptions.responseText: Caught me. I live for this moment, turning you into a drooling mess. Consider it a charity case.

followUpOptions.optionText: Maybe you’re the one shopping... for attention.
followUpOptions.responseText: If I were, you’d be out of stock. But I like a man with a bit of fight in him. Keep trying.
